dcterms:creator: Seunghwan Choi
Sunghyun Park
Minsoo Lee
Jaegul Choo
dcterms:description: VITON-HD is a high-resolution virtual try-on dataset that utilizes misalignment-aware normalization to improve garment detail preservation during the try-on process.
dcterms:title: VITON-HD

dcterms:description: A dataset created by the authors consisting of 4 million image pairs, where each pair features the same person wearing the same garment in different poses.
dcterms:title: 4 Million image pairs (training dataset)

dcterms:description: A test set consisting of 6,000 unpaired samples, where each sample includes images of different people wearing different garments under various poses.
dcterms:title: 6K test set
